Hi guys a really quick tip on how to make
the perfect crepe so once you've got your

batter made and rested get yourself a pan
on a medium high heat get yourself some butter

and just gently rub on the bottom of your
pan ladle in just enough batter to coat the

base of the pan, angle your wrist from one
side to the other so that your batter sweeps

around the pan to make a nice neat base, crepes
pancakes whatever you want to call them they're

beautiful things ultimately you want your
pancakes cooked for about one minute side

carefully use your hands, fish slice, or go
for a toss if it's taking too long to cook

turn the heat up if it's cooking too quickly
turn the pan down and then finally you find

that place where you get a lovely light golden
pancake super silky and soft and you can cook

them in batches and put them ontop of each
other so there you go guys I hope you enjoyed

that if you want to know how to make that
batter then click the i button up there and

I'll give you one of my very best recipes
thanks guys until next time bye!
